Articles.Content: I'm new too I wanted to make a thread but the site doesn't seem to let me.

Hey Victus. I moved your post to its own thread. Welcome to the forum.

By the way, you should be able to start new threads by clocking on the "+ post new thread" button on the upper left (below the header) of the sub-forum pages.

Edited March 3, 2014 by Vanamonde
Because 'left' is not the same thing as 'right.'

Hello Victus! Welcome to the forums! It's nice to see you here.

Have fun and happy flying!

I didn't expect a thread to be made! thanks.

I guess a bit about myself would be in order. I've been playing for about 80 hours and frequent the KSP sub reddit, none of my friends play this game so I decided to sign up to this forum to chat to like minded others! . Also...I docked for the first time yesterday, it was brilliant.

What? You *only* played 80 hours since you joined (like 50 more days ago?) .

Well, that must be rectified, and you should also be spending more time on this forum (time spent on reddit doesn't help here).

So, we want to hear something more from you soon .

What? You *only* played 80 hours since you joined (like 50 more days ago?) .

Well, that must be rectified, and you should also be spending more time on this forum (time spent on reddit doesn't help here).

So, we want to hear something more from you soon .

Will do. I'll hopefully be able to contribute to the community
